game.name: God of War Ragnarök
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Narrated Game Menus, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, HDR available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 라그나로크가 도착하기 전에, 크레토스와 아트레우스는 답을 찾기 위한 신화 속 여정을 시작합니다. 이제 PC로 즐기세요,
game.shortDescriptionEn: Kratos and Atreus embark on a mythic journey for answers before Ragnarök arrives – now on PC.

reviewHighlights.text: GOW Ragnarok is a game that's replayable enough to be completed twice for me personally, having last played it in 2022 on the PS5. But the main reason...
Bought it for the god killing. Stayed for the parenting lessons. 10/10 would defy prophecy again.
